title: Please help! I cannot get game to launch
body: As my main dest-top is down, I am using a newish laptop.  However everytime I click on the launch button, I get an error message saying something about a bad image, and I have tried uninstalling, everything, and I cannot get my favourite game to work. Please can some kind soul help me?

replies.body:
Most of the time those bad image errors are a good sign that some of the game files somehow got corrupted. Refer to the image below and you should be good to go, but definitely hit me back up if that doesn't work!

https://i.gyazo.com/165d7e2e4e8cdeeaeeb382135e309b7e.png
